mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOOK ( BOOK_NO, BOOK_FARM_NO, BOOK_USER_NO, PLAY_DATE, BOOK_CONTENT, ADULT, KID ) VALUES ( SEQ_BOOK.NEXTVAL, #{farmNo}, #{nickname}, #{playDate}, #{bookContent}, #{adultNo}, #{kidNo} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(BOOK_NO) FROM TB_BOOK WHERE BOOK_USER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT BOOK_NO bookNo, BOOK_FARM_NO farmNo, FARM_TITLE farmTitle, BOOK_USER_NO memberNo, NICKNAME nickname, BOOK_DATE bookDate, PLAY_DATE playDate, BOOK_CONTENT bookContent, ADULT adultNo, KID kidNo FROM TB_BOOK JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(MEMBER_NO = BOOK_USER_NO) JOIN TB_FARM ON(FARM_NO = BOOK_FARM_NO) WHERE BOOK_USER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT BOOK_NO bookNo, DECIDE_DATE as "date" FROM TB_BOOK_DECIDE WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
SELECT BOOK_NO bookNo, CANCEL_DATE as "date", CANCEL_CONTENT content FROM TB_BOOK_CANCEL WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
SELECT BOOK_NO bookNo, PAY_DATE as "date" FROM TB_BOOK_PAY WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}
SELECT BOOK_NO FROM TB_BOOK_PLAY WHERE BOOK_NO = #{bookNo}

SELECT BOOK_NO bookNo, BOOK_FARM_NO farmNo, FARM_TITLE farmTitle, BOOK_USER_NO memberNo, M2.NICKNAME nickname, BOOK_DATE bookDate, PLAY_DATE playDate, BOOK_CONTENT bookContent, ADULT adultNo, KID kidNo FROM TB_BOOK JOIN TB_FARM ON (BOOK_FARM_NO = FARM_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M1 ON(M1.MEMBER_NO = SELLER_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER M2 ON(M2.MEMBER_NO = BOOK_USER_NO) WHERE SELLER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT COUNT(BOOK_NO) FROM TB_BOOK JOIN TB_FARM ON(FARM_NO = BOOK_FARM_NO) WHERE SELLER_NO = #{memberNo}
